reviewText: I have looked for this movie for years; still can't find it on DVD. The VHS was exactly like the vendor described. I couldn't be happier with the prompt delivery. I'm sure we will enjoy this product for years to come. Well, at least until the VCR gives out... I would certainly recommend using this vendor if the opportunity should present itself.

Got the VCR tape and it was exactly as described, arrived undamaged.  I'd been looking for this particular movie for many years.  If given the opportunity, I will order more tapes or DVDs from this vendor.
